## SquaresTechnique interface

Runtime representation of \[\[SquaresStyle\]\] as parsed by \[\[StyleSetEvaluator\]\]. For technique parameters see \[\[PointTechniqueParams\]\].

<b>Signature:</b>

```typescript
export interface SquaresTechnique extends MakeTechniqueAttrs<PointTechniqueParams> 
```
